# Output generated by @ua_chatgpt_bot

Ваше питання: /start

Відповідь: bootstrap-modern-business
## Installation

To run this application, you need a system with python installed.

1. Clone this repository 
```git
git clone https://github.com/cr76/LING660-Movie
```
2. Download this dataset
```
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1s8aT98TZTtT10J9XcBYtAGdtdmuL78-H/view?usp=sharing
```
3. Install Django with pip command
```
pip install Django==2.2
```
4. Create the database
```
python manage.py migrate
```
5. Run server by
```
python manage.py runserver
```
6. Now you can visit the application in http://127.0.0.1:8000
